start.text: Aude: “Wake up, the project bank account is low, you need to do something about it.“

choices.text: “Do you expect me to magically make money appear?“
“You're right, only bad things will happen if I don't solve this.“

talk-with-aude.text: Aude: “I am designed to help you with these type of issues. Do have I to remember you WHO MADE ME?“

choices.text: “I would never dare questioning your judgment.“

aude-tells-you.text: Aude: “You probably know what you should do, even if you're not enjoyed to. Have a bit of courage and go on with it.“

choices.text: “Oh no, I guess it's that time of the year. I will ask for more funding to my bosses“
“There is nothing I have more than speaking to my bosses, I don't need help from nobody, I'll do fine on my own.“

request-funding.text: You spend way too much time finding out who to contact and to write the actual mail.

choices.text: Ask to meet the Company Board to request more funding.

board-meeting.text:
You quickly push stuff away from you webcam frame, in a vain effort to make your office look tidy.
The space-web meeting is about to start.

board-meeting-accepted.text: You receive a (way too) fast positive response, the Board has 5 minutes to spare between two meetings in.. 5 minutes.

aude-warns-you.text: Aude: “Do I have to remind you that you hate dealing with your Bank more ?“

choices.text: “Money comes and goes, you should never worry about it.“ [ignore this issue]
“Companies, Banks, Insurances.. I'm not sure what I hate more. Okay, I'll listen to you for once, let's ask for more funding.“

bad-report-induce-bad-review.text: The Company Board is very displeased by your performances, all of your study indicators are bad. You endure a long speech about how you are lucky to already have been funded this much and should be thankful to the Company.

neutral-review.text: The Company Board looks at your report, then ask you to leave the space-meeting 2min for them to deliberate.

no-more-funding-accepted.text: The Company Board comes back to you announcing that your results are not enough convincing for them to unlock additional funding.

good-report-induce-good-review.text:
The Company Board is exited about the population of subjects you managed to make grow!
They ask you a lot of questions, and seem to be very interested for about 2 full minutes!

minimum-funding-accepted.text: The Company Board comes back to you announcing that your results were sufficient to unlock additional funding. They still believe in the project.

maximum-funding-accepted.text: The Company Board comes back to you announcing they will have excellent news shortly.

maximum-funding-received.text: You haven't heard back from the The Company Board, but you get a congratulation space-mail from an old friend: numerous articles were published into various medias about your Company fully investing on your project due to recent major discoveries.. you don't recalled most of your citations in them, and there is even a montage of you celebrating with your bosses.

choices.text: “I'm not sure how I should feel about this, at least the bank account is full now..“

bad-review-actions.text: The Company Board is talking about various solutions to improve the situation, unfortunately you can only try to orientate their choice towards something you hate less.

choices.text: Offer a toured guide of your infrastructure open to rich investors.
Support the TV documentary idea about your lonely life in outer space.
Accept to try out a dangerous third-party experimental drug on a subset of your specimens

tour-guide-solution.text:
A tour guide of your infrastructure is organized at your station. Some of your Company bossed are present, talking about what a great scientist your are to the rich investors.
One ultra-rich investor takes the opportunity to try-out his new personal land-vehicule of 25 tons on your planet, destroying a tiny forest on his passage.
Since he is happy about his truck, he gives a decent funding.

tv-documentary-solution.text:
You are, as soon as possible, interview by a TV team in the making of their new documentary: “Outer space geeks, a lost forgotten tradition“.
Some funding is generated by the royalites.

experimental-drug-trial.text: You expose a subset of your specimens to an experimental drug of a third-party pharmaceutical company. As expected, the drug supposed to magically cure obesity doesn't work and kills some of the subjects.
